title: OYO estimates EBITDA to cross Rs 2,000 cr in FY26 with Motel 6 acquisition
description: OYO's EBITDA is projected to exceed Rs 2,000 crore by 2025-26, driven by the acquisition of Motel 6. The travel tech company expects Motel 6 to contribute over Rs 630 crore to its EBITDA in the next financial year. OYO plans to refile its IPO papers with SEBI after refinancing a USD 450 million loan at a lower interest rate.
